I bought multiple champions with RP so I'd have a chance to use them in URF. They actually made money off me with URF being the sole reason; That's a pretty solid reason for them to permanently add the mode to me!

Please keep this mode riot, It {{summoner:10}} 'd my will to keep playing league. There's no logical reason why you can't keep it in custom games atleast same with any other special game mode. Oh well then, time to quit til either this mode comes back or the next special mode, i don't play normals anymore because they are boring. well time to find something else to do in the meantime.

I feel the success of U.R.F was due to the stress free environment it created, as everyone was there to REALLY have fun, not just win. There really is no loosing in U.R.F.

Unless of course you go 1v1 against a Ryze.
Even when 1v1'ing a ryze you don't lose, you get second place.

Stress free environment? 
  Person picks OP Burst Champ
  Scores a lot of kills
  Trash talks like he is the greatest player the game has ever seen.
  People that do well in urf often were found trash talking a LOT more than they would do in normal SR I found.

It was good for relieving stress, but it most certainly was not stress free. Playing against a jayce lane that severely out ranges you so you basically sit there and take burst to the face every few seconds.  Playing with a Zed that would have his shadow up 100% of the time and would just have to press R on you or E twice..  *Some matchups just straight up weren't fun to play against.
**I'm looking at you:** nidalee,Katarina (100% ult uptime as long as 1 kill scored.),wukong,sona,ap shaco,ap shen, lux (there was never a second where she could not cast something), Lulu,Cho'Gath (almost a 100% knock up), Alistar , Maokai(Needed shaco's JITB limiter on his saplings), Riven, soraka, twisted fate (good ones could just spam Q and use the ult to perma detect cloaks),rengar,urgot,ap ezreal, leblanc, zed, jayce, hecarim, eve, ap skarner, karma, brand, galio
**Don't even get me started on fizz.**
E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E 
"LOL IM SO GOOD AT THIS GAME" or 
"Y U GUIZ SO BAD LOL? Y U CANT KILL ME?"
E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E-E
Well you got over one third of the entire loL champ pool. Why not include the rest.

More champs are viable in the broken urf mode than are viable in the standard mode.

That's something Riot needs to look into.

Riot, "Because we have to chase him. Because he is the hero lol community deserves, but not the one it needs right now. So we will hunt him. Beacuse he can take it. He is not a game map. He is april fools gag, a fountain of fun, a broken heaven."
